item.description:
It's nearly that time of year again...Canadian Thanksgiving is in two weeks!

This year, the Canadian Meet-up Group in Boston have been invited to join the Harvard Grad Canadian Club for what we hope becomes an annual feast of food and general Canadian good cheer!

-------------------------------------------------------------------
WHEN: Monday 8 October, starting at 6pm
WHERE: Dudley House main dining hall (at the corner of Harvard Yard across from the T stop and the Holyoke centre)
-------------------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE NOTE:.... Canadian Thanksgiving is the biggest event on the Canadian Club calendar. So we're looking for tons of help to make sure the event is a big success for the 100-200 people who will show up for food and fun!

Right now we're looking for volunteers to cook - turkeys, mashed potatoes, vegetarian dishes, and dessert. If you could help with any of these things, that would be wonderful!

We will supply the turkeys, but we need your cooking skills and your ovens. We need you. Only your turkey-cooking efforts can turn cold, clammy, raw turkey into steaming, aromatic, saliva-inducing, cooked turkey dinner.

Only your efforts can guarantee that everyone will achieve gastronomic contentment at the Thanksgiving party!

Please volunteer if you can help! Email Ben (bglee@fas.harvard.edu).

If you are in Boston for Thanksgiving, then you should definitely come and enjoy the food and festivities. All spouses, non-Canadian friends and non-Harvardians who would like to join us are welcome. Spread the word to everyone you know!

Thanks!
Harvard Grad Canadian Club /
Canadian Expatriates in Boston Meetup Group

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canadian Thanksgiving - October 8
